title: NexusDataModels
description: Data model registry with field definitions, relationships, and migration history

models.description: All data models (ORM entities, database tables) in the project

name.description: Model class name, e.g. User, Post, Order

tableName.description: Database table name, if different from the pluralized model name

fields.description: List of fields/columns in this model

type.description: Data type, e.g. string, integer, boolean, datetime, uuid, jsonb, text

nullable.description: Whether this field can be null

defaultValue.description: Default value for this field. Can be any JSON-serializable value or a SQL expression string.

unique.description: Whether this field has a unique constraint

indexed.description: Whether this field has a database index

primaryKey.description: Whether this field is the primary key

relationships.description: ORM-level relationships defined on this model

foreignKey.description: The foreign key field used in this relationship

through.description: Join table name for many-to-many relationships defined as two hasMany edges

moduleId.description: The module that owns this model

migrations.description: Ordered list of database migrations with their application status

id.description: Migration identifier, typically a timestamp prefix like 20240101_add_users

appliedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this migration was applied. Absent if not yet applied.

lastAnalyzed.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last data model analysis run
